name: Pork with Garlic Sauce
description: Signature dish of Sichuan cuisine, shredded pork with garlic sauce delivers a sophisticated and addictive taste: tangy, spicy, sweet & sour.

name: Pan Fried Belt Fish
description: A traditional pan fried fish stew using soy sauce, sugar, green onion, garlic and ginger.

name: Huangmenji, Braised Chicken Rice
description: A scrumptious Chinese dish that combines tender chicken with spicy peppers and perfectly cooked rice.
